pageProduct.name: Waxaway Salon Wax 200g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Known as '‘hard wax'  in the professional beauty industry,
Waxaway Salon Wax is the salon style, or traditional method of
hair removal, whereby the wax sets hard and is removed with
the fingertips, meaning no fabric strips are required. Hard wax is
usually heated using a professional wax heater; however,
Waxaway has made its Salon Wax suitable to heat in the
microwave for a professional experience without the fuss.

With almond oil, Salon Wax is ideal for sensitive skins and is
particularly suitable for fine and coarse ha
